question: Who among the following personalities associated with the formation of UP Kisan Sabha (1918)?
explanation: To organise peasants into Kisan Sabhas, the UP Kisan Sabha was set up in 1918 at Lucknow by the active members of Home Rule League viz. Gauri Shankar Misra, Indra Narain Dwivedi and Madan Mohan Malviya. It had established 450 branches in 173 tehsils of the province by mid-1919.
